mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO product (product_name, description) VALUES (#{productName}, #{description})

INSERT IGNORE INTO product_process(product_id, process_order, material_name_id, blender_name_id) SELECT #{productId}, #{processOrder}, material_name_id, blender_name_id FROM material_name , product_name WHERE material_name = #{materialName}) and blender_name = #{blenderName};
mapper.update: UPDATE IGNORE `product_process` SET material_name_id = (SELECT material_name_id FROM material_name WHERE material_name = #{materialName}), blender_name_id = (SELECT blender_name_id FROM blender_name WHERE blender_name = #{blenderName}), WHERE product_id = #{productId} and process_order = #{processOrder} ;
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM product WHERE product_name = #{productName};
DELETE IGNORE FROM product_material WHERE product_id = #{productId};
DELETE IGNORE FROM product_process WHERE product_id = #{productId};
mapper.select: SELECT product_material.product_id, material_name.material_name, product_material.weight FROM product_material, material_name WHERE product_material.material_name_id = material_name.material_name_id and product_material.product_id = #{productId};

SELECT product_process.product_id, product_process.process_order, material_name.material_name, blender_name.blender_name FROM product_process, material_name,blender_name WHERE product_process.material_name_id = material_name.material_name_id and product_process.blender_name_id = blender_name.blender_name_id and product_process.product_id = #{productId};
